DOC.brief_summary: This observational study investigate prevalence osteoporotic fracture post menopausal patient . Post menopausal patient visit OS ( orthopedic surgery ) include GHs ( general hospital ) clinic enrol .
DOC.brief_title: The Prevalence Osteoporotic Vertebral Compression Fractures ( OVCF ) Korean Post Menopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: This observational study investigate prevalence osteoporotic fracture post menopausal patient . Post menopausal patient visit OS ( orthopedic surgery ) include GHs ( general hospital ) clinic enrol . They take evaluation spine X-ray answer question . Their medical record review relevant clinical finding collect .
DOC.criteria: Subjects diagnose post menopausal state Subjects 50 year old The Definition Post Menopause Women : Women whose last menstruation 12months ago Subjects visit orthopedic surgery Subjects inform consent Subjects confirm post menopause state Subjects understand content questionnaire Subjects 80 year old Subjects experience high energy fracture ( include trash fall ) within 3 month . Subjects experienced fracture except vertebral fracture within 6 month Unable evaluate Lspine BMD 2 level spinal fracture instrumentation Lspine 14 . Unable evaluate BMD femur hip fracture instrumentation .
